Por favor, seleccione una empresa a la q: Please, select a company to link the offer to.
Organismo público descentralizado, con p: Public organization, with legal personality and own assets, called Interoceanic Corredor of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec, sectorized to the Ministry of Navy
Ser un organismo que consolide el desarr: To be an organization that consolidates the integral, sustainable, sustainable and inclusive development of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec, through the logistics platform, formed by the provision of port administration services and its interconnection through railroad transportation, and other activities that concretize the development of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region and its areas of influence, in order to generate economic and integral growth for the population from the social and cultural spheres.
Instrumentar una Plataforma Logística mu: To implement a multimodal Logistics Platform that integrates the provision of services of the Administrations of the National Port System Coatzacoalcos S.A. de C.V., Salina Cruz S.A. de C.V., Dos Bocas S.A. de C.V. and Puerto Chiapas S.A. de C.V., and its interconnection by means of railroad transportation, through Ferrocarril del Istmo de Tehuantepec, S.A. de C.V.; by means of the actions that allow it to harmonize the multimodal platform, as well as the acquisition, concession, or in its case, alienation of the properties denominated Poles of Development for the Well-being, for the economic, social and cultural development, from the sustainable and inclusive scope, in benefit of the population of the Region of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec and its Area of Influence.
Instrumentar una plataforma logística mu: To implement a multimodal logistics platform that integrates the provision of services from the administrations of the national port system Coatzacoalcos S.A. de C.V., Salina Cruz S.A. de C.V., Dos Bocas S.A. de C.V., and Puerto Chiapas, S.A. de C.V., and their interconnection through rail transport, via Ferrocarril del Istmo de Tehuantepec, S.A. de C.V., as well as to acquire, develop, partition, commercialize, concession, award, and, if applicable, dispose of the properties that comprise its assets, enabling the establishment of development hubs for well-being, based on the productive vocations determined for the corresponding polygons of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region, with a comprehensive, sustainable, inclusive vision that promotes economic, productive, and cultural growth. To this end, the following actions must be taken:
Procurar, mediante inversión pública y p: Procure, through public and private investment, the construction of the necessary physical, social, and productive infrastructure to strengthen the economic base of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region;
Promover, a través de la realización de: Promote, through the execution of necessary legal acts, the modernization of the physical infrastructure and productive capacity of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region;
Mejorar, a través de la coordinación de: Enhance, through coordination between public and private entities, infrastructure, security, and productive activity to overcome the region's backlog in the Isthmus of Tehuantepec;
Colaborar con el Instituto Nacional de l: Collaborate with the National Institute of Indigenous Peoples so that the development generated by its activity takes place in an environment that preserves the culture, customs of the Isthmus of Tehuantepec region, the identity of indigenous peoples, and the protection of natural resources;
Colaborar con las autoridades competente: Collaborate with the competent authorities in the execution of the corresponding planning mechanisms that, if applicable, are approved in terms of the Planning Law.
